original_title: Brianna Love: Her Fine Sexy Self
overview: The legendary John Leslie triumphantly returns to feature filmmaking with this sexual drama, a star vehicle showcasing the skills of the delectable Brianna Love. Brianna plays a ballsy, fun-loving babe who frequents a busy neighborhood bar where Frankie Dap (Leslie), who's known her all her life, hangs out. A trusting sort, Brianna fucks various guys until she runs into an unexpected situation. When another bar girl (Christina Aguchi) nearly falls prey to the same danger, the scene is set for a thrilling climax, and a clash between bad and badder. Insanely hot women, hard sex, rich storytelling and classic Leslie editing and camerawork make this a must-see!
title: Brianna Love: Her Fine Sexy Self
